text: The Commission shall report on an annual basis to the Mayor and Council on the work of the Commission and areas of the Homeland Security Program in need of improvement and shall make the annual report available to the public.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction.

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-262, see notes following § 7-2271.01.

For Law 17-353, see notes following § 7-161.

DC CODE § 7-2271.07

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: District of Columbia Homeland Security Commission.

heading.catch_text: Report to the Mayor, Council, and the public.
